'''Starsplinter Iron''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Bygones Times Like Dust Passing}}. Four copies of this item are obtainable, however only two are required to proceed the quest.

==Locations==
All Starsplinter Iron ores can be found at the mountain foot nearby the [[Sea of Clouds]]' southwestern-most [[Teleport Waypoint]], within the radius marked during the "Bygones Times Like Dust Passing" quest.

==Trivia==
* When in proximity to this item, [[Visions]] will glow a pulsating yellow. The only exceptions to this rule are [[Venti]] and [[Zhongli]], as their Visions are not real functional ones.
* Characters who do not wear any vision, such as the [[Traveler]], [[Raiden Shogun]], [[Nahida]], and [[Neuvillette]] have no substitute visual cue.<!--What about Red Dead of Night Diluc?-->
** In [[Version 4.1]], Neuvillette's collar gem used to react to Starsplinter Iron in the same way a Vision would. This was however confirmed to be a bug and fixed in [[Version 4.2]].
